about.title: About Wishera
about.subtitle: Making gift-giving easier, more meaningful, and more enjoyable for everyone.
about.missionText1: We believe that gift-giving should be a joyful, stress-free experience. Our mission is to create a platform that makes it easy for people to share their wishes and for loved ones to give meaningful gifts that truly matter.
about.missionText2: By combining modern technology with thoughtful design, we're building a community where the act of giving becomes more personal, more meaningful, and more enjoyable for everyone involved.
about.valuesSubtitle: These core principles guide everything we do and every decision we make.
about.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about using Wishera to make gift-giving easier and more enjoyable.

userCentric.title: User-Centric Design
userCentric.description: Every feature is designed with the user in mind, ensuring an intuitive and enjoyable experience.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your data is protected with industry-standard security measures and privacy controls.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly exploring new technologies to deliver cutting-edge features and experiences.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a platform that brings people together through the joy of gift-giving.

q1.question: How does the gift reservation system work?
q1.answer: When someone views your wishlist, they can reserve a gift without you seeing who reserved it. This prevents duplicate gifts while keeping the surprise intact. You'll only see that an item has been reserved, not who reserved it.

q2.question: Is my wishlist private?
q2.answer: You have full control over your wishlist privacy. You can make it public with a shareable link, private for invited friends only, or completely private for your eyes only. Your privacy settings can be changed at any time.

q3.question: Can I add images to my wishlist items?
q3.answer: Yes! You can upload images for each wishlist item using our Cloudinary integration. This helps others see exactly what you want and makes your wishlist more visually appealing.

q4.question: How do I share my wishlist with friends?
q4.answer: Simply click the 'Share' button on your wishlist to generate a unique link. You can then send this link to friends and family via email, text, or social media. They can view your wishlist without needing to create an account.

q5.question: What happens when someone reserves a gift?
q5.answer: When someone reserves a gift, it's marked as 'Reserved' on your wishlist. This prevents others from buying the same item. The person who reserved it can see their reserved items in their account, but you won't know who reserved what.

q6.question: Can I edit or remove items from my wishlist?
q6.answer: Absolutely! You can edit any item on your wishlist at any time. You can change the name, description, price, image, or remove items completely. Changes are reflected immediately for anyone viewing your wishlist.

q7.question: Is there a limit to how many items I can add?
q7.answer: Currently, there's no limit to the number of items you can add to your wishlist. Add as many items as you'd like, from small stocking stuffers to big-ticket items.

q8.question: How secure is my account and data?
q8.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted, passwords are securely hashed, and we use industry-standard security measures. We never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Cookies
section2.description: Wishera uses cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. We use cookies for the following purposes:
section2.essential: Essential Cookies: These are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
section2.authentication: Authentication: To keep you logged in and maintain your session security.
section2.preferences: Preferences: To remember your language, theme, and other settings.
section2.analytics: Analytics: To understand how visitors interact with our website and improve our services.
section2.functionality: Functionality: To enable features like wishlist sharing and notifications.

section3.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
section3.sessionDescription: These temporary cookies are deleted when you close your browser. They help maintain your session while you're using our service.
section3.persistentDescription: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience on future visits.
section3.thirdPartyDescription: We may use services from third-party providers that set cookies on your device. These help us analyze website traffic and provide enhanced features.

section4.title: 4. Managing Cookies
section4.description: You have control over cookies. Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
section4.view: View and delete cookies stored on your device
section4.delete: Delete all cookies when you close your browser
section4.note: Please note that blocking or deleting cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our website.

section5.title: 5. Tracking Technologies
section5.description: In addition to cookies, we may use other tracking technologies such as web beacons, pixel tags, and local storage. These technologies help us understand how you interact with our service and improve your experience.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
section6.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Welcome to Our Community
section1.description: Wishera is built on the principles of respect, kindness, and thoughtful gift-giving. These guidelines help ensure that our community remains a positive and welcoming space for everyone.

section2.title: 2. Be Respectful
section2.description: Treat all members of the community with respect and kindness. We celebrate diversity and welcome people from all backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives.
section2.inclusive: Use inclusive language and avoid offensive or discriminatory content
section2.considerate: Be considerate of others' feelings and experiences
section2.avoid: Avoid personal attacks, harassment, or bullying

section3.title: 3. Content Guidelines
section3.appropriateDescription: When creating wishlists and sharing content, ensure that:
section3.appropriate1: All content is appropriate for all audiences
section3.appropriate2: Images and descriptions are accurate and not misleading
section3.appropriate3: Content does not violate any laws or regulations
section3.appropriate4: Content does not infringe on intellectual property rights
section3.prohibitedDescription: The following types of content are not allowed:
section3.prohibited5: Personal information of others without consent

section4.title: 4. Gift Reservations
section4.description: When reserving gifts from someone's wishlist:
section4.reserve1: Only reserve gifts you genuinely intend to purchase
section4.reserve2: Respect the reservation system and don't abuse it
section4.reserve3: Cancel reservations if you change your mind in a timely manner
section4.reserve4: Be considerate of others who may also want to reserve the same gift

section5.title: 5. Privacy and Safety
section5.description: Protect your privacy and the privacy of others:
section5.privacy3: Report any suspicious or harmful behavior

section6.title: 6. Reporting Violations
section6.description: If you encounter content or behavior that violates these guidelines:
section6.report2: Provide as much detail as possible
section6.report3: Don't engage with or escalate the situation
section6.report4: We will review all reports and take appropriate action

section7.title: 7. Consequences of Violations
section7.description: Violations of these guidelines may result in:
section7.consequence2: Warning or suspension of your account

section8.title: 8. Building a Positive Community
section8.positive5: Respect different gift-giving traditions and cultures

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.description: If you have questions about these guidelines or need to report a violation, please contact us at:
